text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Administration funds" means any payment or other money which is:
Paid to a person licensed under Subtitle 2, 3, 4, or 6 of this title; and
Owed to the Administration for payment of taxes or fees.

section.section: "Dealer" means, except as provided in paragraph (3) of this subsection, a dealer in vehicles of a type required to be registered under Title 13 of this article.

"Dealer" includes:
A person who is in the business of buying, selling, or exchanging vehicles, including a person who during any 12-month period offers to sell three or more of these vehicles, the ownership of which was acquired for resale purposes; and
For the purposes of §§ 15-301 through 15-315, inclusive, of this title, any person who sells vehicles, whether or not that person acquired the vehicles for personal or business use, if the vehicles are displayed at a fixed location used principally for the purpose of selling vehicles on a regular basis.
For the purposes of subparagraph (i)1 of this paragraph, a person who offers to sell three or more vehicles during any 12-month period is presumed to have acquired the vehicles for resale purposes.
The vehicle owner has the burden of rebutting the presumption established under sub-subparagraph 1 of this subparagraph by a preponderance of the evidence.

text.section: "New Class A vehicle" and "new Class B vehicle" means a new vehicle that, if later sold and registered in this State, could be registered either as a Class A (passenger) vehicle or a Class B (for hire) vehicle, as the case may be.
"Truck component part" means a truck's engine, power train, or rear axle that is not warranted by the final manufacturer of the truck.
"Two-stage vehicle" means a two-stage vehicle, as defined in § 13-113.2 of this article, that is of a type required to be registered under Title 13 of this article.

section.section:
"Vehicle salesman" means, except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, any individual who:
For a commission or other compensation, under any form of agreement or arrangement with a dealer, buys, sells, or exchanges or negotiates or attempts to negotiate a sale or exchange of an interest in a vehicle of a type required to be registered under Title 13 of this article; or
Induces or attempts to induce any other person to buy or exchange an interest in a vehicle of a type required to be registered under Title 13 of this article and receives or expects to receive a commission or other compensation from either the seller or the buyer of the vehicle.

"Vehicle salesman" does not include:
A person described in subsection (c)(3) of this section;
An individual acting as a representative of a person described in subsection (c)(3) of this section;
A person who:
Is compensated for arranging for the leasing of a vehicle for a period exceeding 180 days; and
As an incidental step in the consummation of the lease, induces or arranges for the sale of a vehicle from a licensed dealer to another person, who in turn leases the vehicle to a lessee under a lease not intended as a security; or
A person engaged in the leasing of vehicles under leases not intended as security.
